Description:
Copilot-licensed enterprise users will benefit from Enhanced Personalization in Microsoft 365 Copilot through a new communication memory that further improves personalization by increasing the relevance and quality of responses based on previous communications. Communications memory is private to the user and based purely on communications the user has access to.
GA date: September CY2025
Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Enhanced Personalization via Communication Memory in Copilot
